To begin setting up your website navigate to your profile, click B1.Church
Go to the admin gear at the bottom click on the website icon
Go to manage appearance
Click on the color palette, and you can choose from a variety of different colors for your website
Choose the best fits your needs and click save
Choose a font. Fonts are shown below to give you examples of what you might use.
Choose one for the headings and one font for the body or choose the same font for both
If you can program or know how to use JavaScript, you can use the CSS function
Next load your logos, click the edit pencil and add your logo
Make sure to follow the instructions in the logo box for the correct size and type of logo
Upload the logos from your computer
Be sure to click save. Now you are ready to begin designing your website
